definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: filth;—abs. ´[[ח]] Is 28:8 (of drunkards’ vomit, cf. [[קִיא]]); ´[[ח]] fig. of iniquity, cstr. [[חׂאַת]] Is 4:4, sf. [[חׂאָתוֹ]] Pr 30:12; specif. of human excrement ( = [[[חֵאָה]]]) sf. [[חֵאָתָם]] 2Ki 18:27 = Is 36:12. (both Qr; Kt [[יהם]]([[א]])[[חר]], cf. [[[חֶרֶא]]] p. 351 supr.).
